title: [Basalt Hillock, Narrow Gulch]
description: The trail winds and twists as basalt walls rise on either side of it.  The floor is broken with a jumble of rocks, and high on the walls, large wasp nests cling, safe from the reach of land-bound creatures.  Wasps buzz industriously around the huge nests, mere pin-pricks against the moonlit sky.

The trail winds and twists as basalt walls rise on either side of it.  The floor is broken with a jumble of rocks, and high on the walls, large wasp nests cling, safe from the reach of land-bound creatures.  Wasps buzz industriously around the huge nests, mere pin-pricks against the sky.
